Name: Yelan
Title: "Valley Orchid" Yelan
Desc: The world is vast and infinite, the solitary one comes and goes as she pleases.
Source: Reward for inviting Yelan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

C112091.Name: Breakthrough
C112091.Desc:
This state starts with 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Breakthrough</color> stack. When re-attached, add 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Breakthrough</color> stack. <color=#FFFFFFFF>Breakthrough</color> can have a maximum of 3 stacks.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Breakthrough</color> stack.

<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack:</color> If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Breakthrough</color> has at least 2 stacks, consume 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Breakthrough</color> stacks to convert $[K100] dealt into $[K102] and draw 1 card.

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

K102.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>
K102.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>：DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

C112092.Name: Exquisite Throw
C112092.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses a Normal Attack:</color> Deal 1 $[K102].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>

K102.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>
K102.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>：DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

12094.Name: Breakthrough
12094.Desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112091]</color>.

C112091.Name: Breakthrough
C112091.Desc:
This state starts with 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Breakthrough</color> stack. When re-attached, add 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Breakthrough</color> stack. <color=#FFFFFFFF>Breakthrough</color> can have a maximum of 3 stacks.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Breakthrough</color> stack.

<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack:</color> If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Breakthrough</color> has at least 2 stacks, consume 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Breakthrough</color> stacks to convert $[K100] dealt into $[K102] and draw 1 card.
